entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:48 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain with freezing rain this evening and after midnight and with periods of freezing drizzle overnight. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle. Drizzle or periods of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
